JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Housekeeping Student Job (WEEKEND) - 25 Hours Paper Island
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Our Housekeeping Team at 25 Hours Paper Island is looking for 1 new Team Member with high energy & a "Yes we can - attitude" to join.

25 Hours Paper Island is a brand new high end boutique hotel with 128 rooms. The hotel is located just 12 min. walk from Kongens Nytorv.

We focus on high quality and you will be cleaning around 11-12 check outs per day.

We have the following positions open: # Hotel Rooms Cleaning - Weekend

Contract 10 hours pr. week - 43,33H pr. month
Working hours 10.00 – 15.30/16.00 - Every weekend
Possible to work extra shifts between Monday - Froday

To apply you must have:

  • A great eye for details
  • Be able to work fast and efficient
  • Have high evergy and a positive attitude
  • Be able to work every weekend

WE PAY PER HOUR AND NOT PER ROOM

Please forward your CV and picture to info@keeperz.dk

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,

Kenneth Willemoes
Keeperz ApS
www.Keeperz.dk
